Changelog

1.4.0 - February 03, 2020

Updated
  • Bootstrap to v4.4.1
  • Popper.js to v1.16.0
  • Font Awesome to v5.12.0
  • Dev dependencies, including package.json and gulpfile.js
Added
  • Page title variable to njk templates
  • PurgeCSS tool to remove unused CSS
  • _user-vars.scss and _user.scss files
Changed
  • Extended and revised documentation
  • Revised headings hierarchy in all templates
  • Increased theme colors contrast ratio
  • Minor CSS changes
  • Moved scripts files to <head>, adding defer attribute
Deleted
  • .btn-pill and replaced by Bootstrap .rounded-pill

1.3.2 - May 18, 2019

Updated
  • jQuery to v3.4.1
  • Popper.js to v1.15.0
  • Font Awesome to v5.8.2

1.3.1 - April 27, 2019

Added
  • min-height to cards to fix image height on IE11: _card.scss

1.3.0 - April 04, 2019

Added
  • New demo pages
  • Styles
    • Font family class (serif/sans-serif): _text.scss
    • Class for minimum height size: _sizing.scss
    • Spacing value: _variables.scss
    • Style for centered blockquote: _type.scss
    • Hover effect to linked thumbnails: _images.scss
Updated
  • Bootstrap to v4.3.1
  • Font Awesome to v5.8.1
  • Gulp to v4.0.0

1.2.0 - February 04, 2019

Updated
  • Bootstrap to v4.2.1
  • Popper.js to v1.14.7
  • Font Awesome to v5.7.0
Changed
  • Minor CSS changes

1.1.0 - October 24, 2018

Added
  • New demo pages
  • Pagination styles: _pagination.scss
  • Table styles: _tables.scss
Updated
  • Font Awesome to v5.4.1
Changed
  • Transition properties: _cards.scss, _links.scss

1.0.0 - Initial release
